title: 最大字符串配对数目 (Find Maximum Number of String Pairs)
content: 思路:暴力解法 // @Title: 最大字符串配对数目 (Find Maximum Number of String Pairs) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-01-17 21:22:23 // @Runtime: 1 ms // @Memory: 41.2 MB // @comment: 暴力解法 // @flag: WHITE class Solution { public int maximumNumberOfStringPairs(String[] words) { int result = 0; for (int i = 0; i < words.length; i++) { if (words[i] == null) { continue; } for (int j = i + 1; j < words.length; j++) { if (words[j] == null) { continue; } if (match(words[i], words[j])) { result++; words[j] = null; break; } } } return result; } boolean match(String s1, String s2) { if (s1.length() != s2.length()) { return false; } for (int i = 0; i < s1.length(); i++) { if (s1.charAt(i) != s2.charAt(s2.length() - i - 1)) { return false; } } return true; } }
